rules.natural: If the FintechStartup adopts BlockchainAPI, then it develops MobileWallet.
Either the FintechStartup adopts BlockchainAPI or the InvestmentBank adopts BlockchainAPI.
Whenever the FintechStartup hires SecurityExpert, either it achieves ProductLaunch or the InvestmentBank achieves ProductLaunch.
The FintechStartup hires SecurityExpert or the InvestmentBank hires SecurityExpert.
Under the condition that the InvestmentBank hires SecurityExpert, either the FintechStartup achieves ProductLaunch or the InvestmentBank achieves ProductLaunch.
Provided that the FintechStartup passes SecurityAudit, if it implements EncryptionProtocol, then either it achieves ProductLaunch or the InvestmentBank achieves ProductLaunch.
Whenever the FintechStartup maintains Compliance, it passes SecurityAudit.
Under the condition that the FintechStartup forms_partnership with PaymentProcessor, either it achieves ProductLaunch or the InvestmentBank achieves ProductLaunch.
The FintechStartup forms_partnership with PaymentProcessor or the InvestmentBank forms_partnership with PaymentProcessor.

Either the FintechStartup faces_regulatory_hurdles or, if it creates PatentApplication, then provided that the InvestmentBank forms_partnership with PaymentProcessor, either the FintechStartup achieves ProductLaunch or the InvestmentBank achieves ProductLaunch.
Under the condition that the FintechStartup experiences_data_breach, it maintains_customer_trust.
If the FintechStartup experiences_data_breach, then it is not the case that it maintains_customer_trust.
Whenever the InvestmentBank adopts BlockchainAPI, CryptoPaymentPlatform is a successful_digital_product.

Either the FintechStartup achieves_profitability or, if it is not the case that adopting BlockchainAPI leads to CryptoPaymentPlatform being a successful_digital_product, then the FintechStartup does not face_regulatory_investigation.
If the FintechStartup expands_globally, then it does not establish_international_office.
The FintechStartup expands_globally or it does not achieve_profitability.
Under the condition that the FintechStartup acquires_competitor, it increases_market_share.
Whenever the FintechStartup acquires_competitor, it gains_customers.
Either the FintechStartup acquires_competitor or, if it expands_globally, then it establishes_international_office.
Provided that the FintechStartup gains_customers, it improves_brand_recognition.
If the FintechStartup improves_brand_recognition, then it is not the case that it increases_market_share.
Provided that the FintechStartup is active during Q1_2024, if it develops MobileWallet, then CryptoPaymentPlatform is a successful_digital_product.
The FintechStartup is active during Q1_2024 or the InvestmentBank is active during Q1_2024.

If the FintechStartup receives_funding from VentureCapital, then provided that the InvestmentBank is active during Q1_2024, if the FintechStartup develops MobileWallet, then CryptoPaymentPlatform is a successful_digital_product.

Whenever the InvestmentBank receives_funding from PrivateEquity, if it is active during Q1_2024, then under the condition that the FintechStartup develops MobileWallet, CryptoPaymentPlatform is a successful_digital_product.
Provided that the FintechStartup achieves ProductLaunch, it receives_funding from VentureCapital.
Under the condition that the InvestmentBank achieves ProductLaunch, it receives_funding from PrivateEquity.
If it is not the case that adopting BlockchainAPI by the FintechStartup leads to CryptoPaymentPlatform being a successful_digital_product, then the FintechStartup experiences_data_breach.

Provided that it is not the case that adopting BlockchainAPI by the FintechStartup leads to CryptoPaymentPlatform being a successful_digital_product, the FintechStartup faces_regulatory_investigation.

facts.natural: It is not the case that the FintechStartup faces_regulatory_hurdles.

(A1 → A3).natural: If the FintechStartup adopts BlockchainAPI, then it develops MobileWallet.

(A1 → G).natural: Provided that the FintechStartup adopts BlockchainAPI, CryptoPaymentPlatform becomes a successful_digital_product.

(A1 ∨ A2).natural: Either the FintechStartup adopts BlockchainAPI or the InvestmentBank adopts BlockchainAPI.

(A10 → (A8 ∨ A9)).natural: Whenever the FintechStartup hires SecurityExpert, either it achieves ProductLaunch or the InvestmentBank achieves ProductLaunch.

(A10 ∨ A11).natural: The FintechStartup hires SecurityExpert or the InvestmentBank hires SecurityExpert.

(A11 → (A8 ∨ A9)).natural: Under the condition that the InvestmentBank hires SecurityExpert, either the FintechStartup achieves ProductLaunch or the InvestmentBank achieves ProductLaunch.

(A12 → (A8 ∨ A9)).natural: If the FintechStartup implements EncryptionProtocol, then either it achieves ProductLaunch or the InvestmentBank achieves ProductLaunch.

(A13 → (A12 → (A8 ∨ A9))).natural: Provided that the FintechStartup passes SecurityAudit, if it implements EncryptionProtocol, then either it achieves ProductLaunch or the InvestmentBank achieves ProductLaunch.

(A14 → A13).natural: Whenever the FintechStartup maintains Compliance, it passes SecurityAudit.

(A15 → (A8 ∨ A9)).natural: Under the condition that the FintechStartup forms_partnership with PaymentProcessor, either it achieves ProductLaunch or the InvestmentBank achieves ProductLaunch.

(A15 ∨ A16).natural: The FintechStartup forms_partnership with PaymentProcessor or the InvestmentBank forms_partnership with PaymentProcessor.

(A16 → (A8 ∨ A9)).natural: If the InvestmentBank forms_partnership with PaymentProcessor, then either the FintechStartup achieves ProductLaunch or the InvestmentBank achieves ProductLaunch.

(A17 → (A16 → (A8 ∨ A9))).natural: Provided that the FintechStartup creates PatentApplication, if the InvestmentBank forms_partnership with PaymentProcessor, then either the FintechStartup achieves ProductLaunch or the InvestmentBank achieves ProductLaunch.

(A18 ∨ (A17 → (A16 → (A8 ∨ A9)))).natural: Either the FintechStartup faces_regulatory_hurdles or, if it creates PatentApplication, then provided that the InvestmentBank forms_partnership with PaymentProcessor, either the FintechStartup achieves ProductLaunch or the InvestmentBank achieves ProductLaunch.

(A19 → A20).natural: Under the condition that the FintechStartup experiences_data_breach, it maintains_customer_trust.

(A19 → ¬A20).natural: If the FintechStartup experiences_data_breach, then it is not the case that it maintains_customer_trust.

(A2 → G).natural: Whenever the InvestmentBank adopts BlockchainAPI, CryptoPaymentPlatform is a successful_digital_product.

(A22 ∨ (¬(A1 → G) → ¬A21)).natural: Either the FintechStartup achieves_profitability or, if it is not the case that adopting BlockchainAPI leads to CryptoPaymentPlatform being a successful_digital_product, then the FintechStartup does not face_regulatory_investigation.

(A23 → A24).natural: Provided that the FintechStartup expands_globally, it establishes_international_office.

(A23 → ¬A24).natural: If the FintechStartup expands_globally, then it does not establish_international_office.

(A23 ∨ ¬A22).natural: The FintechStartup expands_globally or it does not achieve_profitability.

(A25 → A26).natural: Under the condition that the FintechStartup acquires_competitor, it increases_market_share.

(A25 → A27).natural: Whenever the FintechStartup acquires_competitor, it gains_customers.

(A25 → ¬A26).natural: If the FintechStartup acquires_competitor, then it is not the case that it increases_market_share.

(A25 ∨ (A23 → A24)).natural: Either the FintechStartup acquires_competitor or, if it expands_globally, then it establishes_international_office.

(A27 → A28).natural: Provided that the FintechStartup gains_customers, it improves_brand_recognition.

(A27 → ¬A26).natural: Under the condition that the FintechStartup gains_customers, it does not increase_market_share.

(A28 → ¬A26).natural: If the FintechStartup improves_brand_recognition, then it is not the case that it increases_market_share.

(A3 → G).natural: Whenever the FintechStartup develops MobileWallet, CryptoPaymentPlatform is a successful_digital_product.

(A4 → (A3 → G)).natural: Provided that the FintechStartup is active during Q1_2024, if it develops MobileWallet, then CryptoPaymentPlatform is a successful_digital_product.

(A4 ∨ A5).natural: The FintechStartup is active during Q1_2024 or the InvestmentBank is active during Q1_2024.

(A5 → (A3 → G)).natural: Under the condition that the InvestmentBank is active during Q1_2024, if the FintechStartup develops MobileWallet, then CryptoPaymentPlatform is a successful_digital_product.

(A6 → (A5 → (A3 → G))).natural: If the FintechStartup receives_funding from VentureCapital, then provided that the InvestmentBank is active during Q1_2024, if the FintechStartup develops MobileWallet, then CryptoPaymentPlatform is a successful_digital_product.

(A6 ∨ A7).natural: The FintechStartup receives_funding from VentureCapital or the InvestmentBank receives_funding from PrivateEquity.

(A7 → (A5 → (A3 → G))).natural: Whenever the InvestmentBank receives_funding from PrivateEquity, if it is active during Q1_2024, then under the condition that the FintechStartup develops MobileWallet, CryptoPaymentPlatform is a successful_digital_product.

(A8 → A6).natural: Provided that the FintechStartup achieves ProductLaunch, it receives_funding from VentureCapital.

(A8 ∨ A9).natural: Either the FintechStartup achieves ProductLaunch or the InvestmentBank achieves ProductLaunch.

(A9 → A7).natural: Under the condition that the InvestmentBank achieves ProductLaunch, it receives_funding from PrivateEquity.

(¬(A1 → G) → A19).natural: If it is not the case that adopting BlockchainAPI by the FintechStartup leads to CryptoPaymentPlatform being a successful_digital_product, then the FintechStartup experiences_data_breach.

(¬(A1 → G) → A21).natural: Provided that it is not the case that adopting BlockchainAPI by the FintechStartup leads to CryptoPaymentPlatform being a successful_digital_product, the FintechStartup faces_regulatory_investigation.

(¬(A1 → G) → ¬A21).natural: Whenever it is not the case that adopting BlockchainAPI by the FintechStartup leads to CryptoPaymentPlatform being a successful_digital_product, the FintechStartup does not face_regulatory_investigation.

¬A18.natural: It is not the case that the FintechStartup faces_regulatory_hurdles.
